abeyance.e: Target is Stunned for 60 seconds. Ignores armor
abeyance.i: "The strength of aether is mine to evoke" x3
abeyance.name: Abeyance

adaptiveblessing.name: Adaptive Blessing
adaptiveblessing.i: "I enchant thee with this blessing" x3
adaptiveblessing.e: Bearer becomes Resistant to one of the following Schools: Death, Flame, Subdual, Command, Sorcery. School is chosen at the time of casting. Does not count towards a players Enchantment limit, may not be worn with any other Enchantments from the Protection School

adaptiveprotection.name: Adaptive Protection
adaptiveprotection.i: "I enchant thee with this protection" x3
adaptiveprotection.e: Bearer becomes Immune to one of the following Schools: Death, Flame, Subdual, Command, Sorcery. School is chosen at the time of casting

agoraphobia.name: Agoraphobia
agoraphobia.i: "I command thee to be alone" x3
agoraphobia.e: Target must remain at least 20’ away from all other players unless forced there by another Magic or Ability. Lasts 30 seconds.

amplification.name: Amplification
amplification.e: Target player’s next Verbal magic is affected as per Extension
amplification.l: May not be used on the caster

ambulant.name: Ambulant
ambulant.keywords: bard druid healer wizard meta magic
ambulant.e: An incantation may be said while moving. May be cast while moving
ambulant.l: May not be used on the Charge incantation

ancestralarmor.name: Ancestral Armor
ancestralarmor.i:
"May this armor protect you from all forms of harm.
May the flames of the fire not burn you.
May the bolts from the heavens not strike you.
May the arrows of your enemies not pierce you.
May this armor protect you from all forms of harm"
ancestralarmor.e: The effects of a Magic Ball, projectile, or weapon which just struck armor worn by the player are ignored, even if the object would not otherwise affect the armor. The armor loses one point of value in the location struck. This effect will not trigger if the armor has no points left in the location struck. Ancestral Armor is not expended after use and will continue to provide protection until removed with Dispel Magic or similar magic or abilities
ancestralarmor.l: Phase Arrow and Phase Bolt interact with armor worn by the bearer as though Ancestral Armor was not present
ancestralarmor.n: Abilities that ignore armor do not trigger Ancestral Armor

assassinate.name: Assassinate
assassinate.i: Say the word "Assassinate" immediately upon killing a person.

astralintervention.name: Astral Intervention
astralintervention.i: "I command thee to retreat into the aether" x 3
astralintervention.e: Target player becomes Insubstantial for 30 seconds

attuned.name: Attuned
attuned.e: May wear an additional Enchantment. Attuned does not count towards the bearer’s Enchantment limit
attuned.l: This ability may not be used in conjunction with any other similar ability or magic

avatarofnature.name: Avatar of Nature
avatarofnature.e: All the casters Enchantments of level 4 and below are now range Self instead of their previous range. Does not apply to Golem

awe.name: Awe
awe.e: Target may not attack or cast magic at the caster. Target must remain at least 20’ away from the caster unless forced there by another Magic or Ability. Lasts 30 seconds
awe.n: If the caster attacks or begins casting another magic at the target, this spell’s effect is negated

banish.name: Banish
banish.i: "The Spirits banish thee from this place" x3
banish.e: Target Insubstantial player must return to their respawn location where their Insubstantial State immediately ends
banish.n: A player bearing Undead Minion or Greater Undead Minion who is currently Insubstantial has their Enchantment removed

barkskin.name: Barkskin
barkskin.e: Bearer gains one point of Magic Armor

battlefieldtriage.name: Battlefield Triage
battlefieldtriage.e: Bearer is Stopped. Bearer may cast Greater Heal by announcing "[Player] thou art made whole". Bearer must remove an Enchantment strip after each use of Greater Heal
battlefieldtriage.n: Battlefield Triage is removed when the last strip is removed

battlemage.name: Battlemage
battlemage.l: May not purchase Enchantments or Magic Balls

bearstrength.name: Bear Strength
bearstrength.i: "I enchant thee with the strength of the bear" x3
bearstrength.e: Bearer’s melee weapons are Shield Crushing

berserk.name: Berserk
berserk.e: All weapons wielded in melee are Armor Breaking

blessedaura.name: Blessed Aura
blessedaura.i: "I enchant thy person, arms, and armor" x3
blessedaura.e: Resistant to all effects from the next source which would inflict a Wound, Death, State, or negatively affect them or their equipment. Does not trigger against effects cast by the player

blessingagainstharm.name: Blessing Against Harm
blessingagainstharm.i: "I enchant thee against all harm" x3
blessingagainstharm.e: Resistant to all effects from the next source which would inflict a Wound, Death, State, or other negative effect. Does not trigger against effects cast by the player

blessingagainstwounds.name: Blessing Against Wounds
blessingagainstwounds.e: Resistant to Wounds. Does not count towards a players Enchantment limit
blessingagainstwounds.l: May not be worn with any other Enchantments from the Protection School

blink.name: Blink
blink.e: Player becomes Insubstantial and can move to any location within 50’ from their starting point
blink.l: Caster may not end State within 10’ of a living enemy

bloodandthunder.name: Blood and Thunder
bloodandthunder.n: Player must still wear a white strip to denote Blessing Against Wounds

breakconcentration.name: Break Concentration
breakconcentration.e: Target player is suppressed for 10 seconds

brutalstrike.name: Brutal Strike
brutalstrike.keywords: anti paladin barbarian verbal death cursed suppressed
brutalstrike.e: Victim is Cursed. Victim is also Suppressed for 30 seconds

calllightning.name: Call Lightning
calllightning.i: "I call lightning’s flame to strike thee" x3

cancel.name: Cancel
cancel.e: Remove an Enchantment cast by the caster

circleofprotection.name: Circle of Protection
circleofprotection.e: The caster and up to five willing players in physical contact with the caster become Insubstantial. The caster may end Circle of Protection at any time by ending his Insubstantial State with the standard Incantation. If the caster stops being Insubstantial by any means, the Enchantment ends. Players under the effect of Circle of Protection may use magic and abilities on players under the effect of the same Circle of Protection as though they were not Insubstantial
circleofprotection.n: Effects which would normally remove the Insubstantial State (Tracking, Release, etc) will remove this Enchantment

combatcaster.name: Combat Caster
combatcaster.e: Does not require an empty hand to cast Magic

confidence.name: Confidence
confidence.e: Target player may instantly Charge a single Magic or Ability
confidence.l: May not be used on self. May not be used within 20’ of a living enemy

contagion.name: Contagion
contagion.i: "May thou bear this plague to all" x3
contagion.e: All melee weapons wielded by player are Wounds Kill. Bearer is Fragile

corrosivemist.name: Corrosive Mist
corrosivemist.i: "The mists of corrosion surround thee" x3
corrosivemist.e: Bearer is Stopped. Bearer may cast Destroy Armor by announcing "[Player] the mists of corrosion destroy your [armor location] armor". Bearer must remove a strip after each use of Destroy Armor
corrosivemist.n: Corrosive Mist is removed when the last strip is removed

coupdegrace.name: Coup de Grace
coupdegrace.keywords: some lowercase separated words used to search
coupdegrace.l: Target must be Wounded when the caster begins the Incantation. Although it still functions even if they are healed by the end of the Incantation

dervish.name: Dervish
dervish.e: Equipment costs are doubled. Each Verbal purchased gives double the uses. Example: 1/Life Charge x3 becomes 2/life Charge x3, 2/life becomes 4/life, 1/Refresh becomes 2/Refresh

destroyarmor.name: Destroy Armor
destroyarmor.e: Armor on target hit location is subjected to Armor Destroying

destructionarrow.name: Destruction Arrow
destructionarrow.m: Arrow with red head cover labeled "Destruction"
destructionarrow.e: This arrow is Armor Destroying and Shield Destroying. Armor Destroying and Shield Destroying are applied after the normal effect of being hit with an arrow is applied

dimensionalrift.name: Dimensional Rift
dimensionalrift.i: "The power of the aether consumes thee" x3

discordia.name: Discordia
discordia.i: "My discordant melodies shall stymie my foes" x3
discordia.e: Tie on five enchantment strips. Bearer may cast Break Concentration by announcing "[Player] thou art suppressed" and removing an enchantment strip. Enchantment is removed when the last strip is removed

dispelmagic.name: Dispel Magic
dispelmagic.keywords: druid healer scout wizard verbal sorcery
dispelmagic.i: "By my power I dispel that magic" x3
dispelmagic.e: All Enchantments on target are removed
dispelmagic.n: Will work through Protection from Magic, Enlightened Soul, Sanctuary, and similar magics and abilities. Will work on players that are Frozen or Insubstantial

draggedbelow.name: Dragged Below
draggedbelow.i: "Death comes for thee from below" x3

elementalbarrage.name: Elemental Barrage
elementalbarrage.i: "I am filled with the power of magic"
elementalbarrage.e: Caster may use Magic Balls they are currently carrying by stating the name of the Magic Ball immediately prior to throwing the ball in place of the incantation
elementalbarrage.l: This magic ends if the caster picks up any additional Magic Balls or begins casting any new magic
elementalbarrage.n: The effect is not an incantation, and so is not stopped by suppression, and may be used while moving, etc.

empower.name: Empower
empower.e: Target player regains one use of any per-life Ability or Magic they have expended
empower.l: Does not function on Empower, Confidence, Restoration, or similar Magic and Abilities. May not be used on the caster
empower.n: Does not allow a player to have more than his maximum uses of a Magic or Ability.

enlightenedsoul.name: Enlightened Soul
enlightenedsoul.i: "A distant magic has no hold upon thy now enlightened soul" x3
enlightenedsoul.e: Player is unaffected by Verbal magic used at a Range greater than Touch
enlightenedsoul.l: Affects beneficial magic as well as harmful magic. Does not affect (ex) abilities.

entangle.name: Entangle
entangle.keywords: druid healer wizard ball subdual stopped
entangle.i: "The strength of earth is mine to evoke" x3
entangle.e: Target is Stopped for 60 seconds. Engulfing

equipmentarmor1point.name: Equipment: Armor, 1 Point
equipmentarmor1point.e: Your class maximum armor limit increases one additional point

equipmentshieldmedium.name: Equipment: Shield, Medium
equipmentshieldmedium.e: May wield up to a medium shield

equipmentweapongreat.name: Equipment: Weapon, Great
equipmentweapongreat.e: May wield one great weapon at a time for each instance purchased (but may carry extras)

equipmentweaponhinged.name: Equipment: Weapon, Hinged
equipmentweaponhinged.e: May wield one hinged weapon at a time for each instance purchased (but may carry extras)

equipmentweaponlong.name: Equipment: Weapon, Long
equipmentweaponlong.e: May wield one long weapon at a time for each instance purchased (but may carry extras)

equipmentweaponshort.name: Equipment: Weapon, Short
equipmentweaponshort.e: May wield one short weapon at a time for each instance purchased (but may carry extras)

essencegraft.name: Essence Graft
essencegraft.i: "Open up and receive my power" x3
essencegraft.e: Bearer may wear up to three additional Enchantments. Essence Graft does not count towards the bearer’s Enchantment limit
essencegraft.l: Bearer may only wear Enchantments from the caster of Essence Graft. This ability may not be used in conjunction with any other similar ability or magic

evoker.name: Evoker
evoker.e: Verbals purchased may only be of range Touch or Self. Elemental Barrage becomes Charge x10
evoker.n: Elemental Barrage must still be purchased

evolution.name: Evolution
evolution.e: May wear an additional Enchantment. Evolution does not count towards the bearer’s Enchantment limit
evolution.n: This ability does work in conjunction with Attuned or Essence Graft so long as the other limitations of those Enchantments are followed

experienced.name: Experienced
experienced.e: A single per-life Verbal purchased becomes Charge x5 in addition to the normal frequency OR a single per- refresh Verbal purchased becomes Charge x10 in addition to the normal frequency. This Verbal must be determined before the game begins and cannot be changed
experienced.l: Verbal must be 4th level or lower

extendimmunities.name: Extend Immunities
extendimmunities.i: Tie strip on target: "May the blessing of my god protect thee" x3
extendimmunities.e: The target player gains either Resistant to Command or Resistant to Death
extendimmunities.l: Type of Ability must be chosen at the time of casting and may not be changed. The caster may only have one instance of Extend Immunities active at a time

extension.name: Extension
extension.keywords: bard druid healer wizard meta magic
extension.e: Verbal becomes 50'. Only works on verbals with a range of 20'

fightaftereeath.name: Fight After Death
fightaftereeath.e: Player continues to fight for seven seconds after being killed. Players must Chant this time out loud. As per Chanting, failure to count immediately ends the effect. Players do not receive further Wounds during Fight After Death. Players melee weapons are Shield Crushing
fightaftereeath.l: Players may not activate Abilities or Magic during Fight After Death. Players may not activate Fight After Death if they died while Suppressed, Stunned, Insubstantial, or Frozen. States on the player (Such as Stopped) persist until Fight After Death has ended and are then removed as per the rules for player death. Players may not achieve game objectives nor carry game items while affected by Fight After Death, though they may still kill other players even if that player is a game objective
fightaftereeath.n: Reeves are encouraged to remove this ability from those who use it in an unsafe manner. Also note that it was clarified online that if a player moves during fight after death they must be summon resurrected from their respawn location since they have moved from where they died

fingerofdeath.name: Finger of Death
fingerofdeath.i: "I call upon death to smite thee" x3

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.i: "The flame of fire is mine to evoke" x3
fireball.e:
Fireball will have one of the following effects on the object first struck:
1. A weapon hit is destroyed
2. A shield hit is subject to Shield Destroying
3. Armor hit with Armor Points remaining is subject to Armor Destroying
4. A player hit receives a Wounds Kill Wound to that hit location

flameblade.name: Flame Blade
flameblade.i: "The element of fire shall infuse your weapons" x3
flameblade.e: Bearer’s melee weapons are Armor Breaking and Shield Crushing. Bearer and their weapons are Immune to Flame

forcebolt.name: Force Bolt
forcebolt.e:
Force Bolt will have one of the following effects on the object first struck:
1. A weapon hit is destroyed
2. Armor hit with Armor Points remaining is subject to Armor Breaking
3. A player hit receives a Wound to that hit location

giftofair.name: Gift of Air
giftofair.i: "I grant thee a gift of the air" x3
giftofair.e: The effects of a melee weapon or projectile which just struck the bearer are ignored, instead the bearer announces "Gift of Air" and becomes Insubstantial. If the bearer is wearing armor it is affected as normal in addition to triggering Gift of Air. Bearer may choose to return directly to their respawn location immediately after Gift of Air activates. Melee weapons with the Armor Breaking, Armor Destroying, Shield Crushing, or Shield Destroying Special Effects will affect the bearer as normal and do not trigger Gift of Air.
giftofair.l: Bearer may not wield weapons or shields
giftofair.n: Bearer may end the Insubstantial state caused by Gift of Air at any time with the standard Incantation

giftofearth.name: Gift of Earth
giftofearth.i: "I grant thee a gift of the earth" x3
giftofearth.e: Bearer gains two points of magic armor and is affected as per Greater Harden. Bearer is Suppressed

giftoffire.name: Gift of Fire
giftoffire.i: "I grant thee a gift of the fire" x3
giftoffire.e: Bearer is Immune to Flame and gains Heat Weapon 1/Refresh Charge x3

giftofwater.name: Gift of Water
giftofwater.i: "I grant thee a gift of the water" x3
giftofwater.e: Bearer gains one point of magic armor and Heal (self- only) unlimited

golem.name: Golem
golem.i: "From earth and clay I form thee" x3
golem.e: Bearer is Immune to Death. Bearer is Cursed. Bearer can remove a Wound via Mend. Bearer may use the caster as an alternate respawn point while the caster is alive. Non-magical armor worn affected as per Imbue Armor. All Enchantments worn by the Bearer, including Golem, are Persistent while Golem is worn
golem.l: A caster may only have a single Golem Enchantment active at a time
golem.n: Greater Mend and Word of Mending will not remove a wound

graspingtentacles.name: Grasping Tentacles
graspingtentacles.i: "The hands of the earth rise to your bidding" x3
graspingtentacles.e: Bearer is Stopped. Bearer may cast Hold Person by announcing "[Player] stop at my command." Bearer must remove an Enchantment strip after each use of Hold Person
graspingtentacles.n: Grasping Tentacles is removed when the last strip is removed

greaterharden.name: Greater Harden
greaterharden.i: "I enchant thee with Greater Harden" x3
greaterharden.e: Shields and weapons wielded by the player are affected as per Harden. May only be cast on a player

greaterheal.name: Greater Heal
greaterheal.i: "By the grace of the divine thou art healed" x5
greaterheal.e: All wounds are healed. Ignores the Cursed State

greatermend.name: Greater Mend
greatermend.i: "Return this [object name] to its former glory" x5
greatermend.e: Will repair a destroyed item or restore all armor points in one location

greaterrelease.name: Greater Release
greaterrelease.i: "From all thine afflictions thou art released" x2
greaterrelease.e: All ongoing effects and States are removed from the target. The caster may choose to leave some States or effects in place
greaterrelease.n: Greater Release may target Dead players. When used to end a State or Ongoing Effect imposed by a magic or ability with multiple effects, all other States and Ongoing Effects from the same source are also ended

greaterresurrect.name: Greater Resurrect
greaterresurrect.i: "By the grace of the divine thou art resurrected" x5
greaterresurrect.e: Target Dead player is returned to life. Enchantments on the player are retained. Any wounds on the player are healed. Works regardless of any States on the target

greaterundeadminion.name: Greater Undead Minion
greaterundeadminion.i:
"Flesh rots, bones break, skulls sigh, spirits take let the power of my will descend on thee
let the power of my will restore thy spirit
let the power of my will knit thy corpse
let the power of my will give thee direction
let the power of my will cheat thy death
by the power of my will, arise my greater minion!"
greaterundeadminion.e:
1. Bearer does not die or respawn as normal
2. Bearer is Cursed and Suppressed
3. When the bearer would normally die, they instead become Insubstantial, remove all Wounds, and must return to the caster as soon as possible. Insubstantial players may not move more than 10’ from the caster and may not speak. The caster may touch the player and then Incant "Rise and fight again" x5 to end this Insubstantial State so long as no living enemies are within 10’ of the bearer.
4. If this Enchantment's Insubstantial is removed from the Bearer in any other manner than outlined in item 3 (or prevented entirely) this Enchantment is removed
5. If the caster dies, this Enchantment is removed the next time the bearer returns to the caster
6. If the Enchantment is removed, the bearer dies
7. For the duration of the Enchantment, the Caster is considered the players respawn
8. Dead players may be targeted by Greater Undead Minion and are immediately returned to life with all Wounds removed and the Insubstantial State applied
greaterundeadminion.l:
1. The Insubstantial State imposed by Greater Undead Minion can be removed or prevented by any Magic or Ability which would normally be capable of removing Insubstantial or preventing Insubstantial such as Tracking, Planar Grounding, Release, or similar Magic and Abilities
2. This Enchantment is removed by Banish and Dimensional Rift if used on the player while they are Insubstantial
3. The caster may not have more than three active Greater Undead Minion and Undead Minion Enchantments combined

harden.name: Harden
harden.e: Bearers weapons or shield may only be destroyed by Magic Balls/Verbals which destroy objects e.g. Fireball or Pyrotechnics
harden.l: Will only affect either the weapons or the shield of the bearer, not both

heal.name: Heal
heal.keywords: druid healer monk paladin scout verbal spirit heal
heal.i:
Sword Cut, spear stab, mace smash, arrow jab.
Let the white light of healing descend on thee.
Let the white light of healing stop thy spilling blood.
Let the white light of healing mend thy bones.
Let the white light of healing close thy wounds.
Let the white light of healing restore thy vigor.
The white light of healing hath healed thee.

heartoftheswarm.name: Heart of the Swarm
heartoftheswarm.i: "Let all those who oppose the hive feel the wrath of the swarm" x3
heartoftheswarm.e: Bearer is Stopped. Any player on the bearer’s team may use the bearer as their respawn point as per the normal game rules. Players respawning at the caster do so by announcing "My life for the swarm."
heartoftheswarm.l: Players can not respawn at the bearer if there are living enemy players or a game objective within 20’ of the bearer

heatweapon.name: Heat Weapon
heatweapon.i: "I call upon flame to heat that [type of weapon]" x3
heatweapon.e: Target weapon may not be wielded for 30 seconds. Players who are Immune to Flame may continue to wield the weapon

holdperson.name: Hold Person
holdperson.keywords: assassin healer scout wizard verbal command
holdperson.e: Target player becomes Stopped for 30 seconds

iceball.name: Iceball
iceball.i: "The strength of ice is mine to evoke" x3
iceball.e: Target player becomes Frozen for 60 seconds. Engulfing

icyblast.name: Icy Blast
icyblast.e: Target player becomes Frozen for 30 seconds

imbuearmor.name: Imbue Armor
imbuearmor.i: "I enchant thee with Imbued Armor" x3
imbuearmor.e: All armor worn by the bearer gains a +1 modifier. This modifier may allow the armor to exceed the maximum value for its type, up to the bearer’s class maximum
imbuearmor.n: Does not apply to magic armor. A player may only benefit from one instance of Imbue Armor, or similar magic and abilities that increase Armor Points, at a time

imbueshield.name: Imbue Shield
imbueshield.i: "This shield shall neither break or bend" x3
imbueshield.e: Shield wielded by the player cannot be destroyed. Engulfing effects hitting the shield are ignored

imbueweapon.name: Imbue Weapon
imbueweapon.i: "I enchant thee to slay all foes" x3
imbueweapon.e: Melee weapons wielded by the bearer are Wounds Kill

innate.name: Innate
innate.keywords: bard druid healer wizard meta magic
innate.e: May be used to instantly Charge a single magic by stating the name of the magic

insult.name: Insult
insult.e: Victim is unable to attack or cast magic at anyone other than the caster for 30 seconds. If the victim of insult is attacked or has magic cast on them by someone other than the caster, the victim of Insult becomes able to choose to attack the offending party as well

ironskin.name: Ironskin
ironskin.e: Bearer is Immune to Flame and gains two points Magic Armor affected as per Ancestral Armor

legend.name: Legend
legend.e: Each Extension purchased gives double the uses. Example: 1/life becomes 2/life. Swift may not be purchased or used

lightningbolt.name: Lightning Bolt
lightningbolt.i: "The flame of storms is mine to evoke" x3
lightningbolt.e:
A player struck is subject to an Engulfing Stopped effect for 60 seconds. In addition Lightning Bolt will have one of the following effects on the object first struck:
1. A weapon hit is destroyed
2. Armor hit with Armor Points remaining is subject to Armor Breaking
3. A player hit receives a Wound in that hit location

lost.name: Lost
lost.i: "I command thee to be lost" x3
lost.e: Player becomes Insubstantial and must move directly to their base. Player must end their Insubstantial State as per normal once they reach their base
lost.n: If the Insubstantial State is ended before reaching the base, the rest of the effect is ended as well

lycanthropy.name: Lycanthropy
lycanthropy.i: "Stalked in the forest, too close to hide, I’ll be upon thee by the moonlight side" x3
lycanthropy.e: Bearer gains two points of magic armor. Bearer’s melee weapons are Shield Crushing. Bearer is Immune to Command

magicballblock.name: Magic Ball Block
magicballblock.e: Player is allowed to block Magic Balls with their weapons and hands without penalty. Any Magic Ball in motion touched by a weapon wielded or by the hand of the player is nullified
magicballblock.n: Engulfing effects from blocked Magic Balls do not activate

masshealing.name: Mass Healing
masshealing.i: "Let the powers of healing flow through me" x3
masshealing.e: Caster may Heal a player by touching them, stating "I grant thee healing". Bearer must remove an Enchantment strip after each use of Heal
masshealing.n: Mass Healing is removed when the last strip is removed. The effect is not an incantation, and so is not stopped by suppression, and may be used while moving, etc.

mend.name: Mend
mend.keywords: archer bard druid healer wizard verbal sorcery
mend.i: "I make this item whole again" x5
mend.e: Destroyed item is repaired, or one point of armor in one location is repaired

missileblock.name: Missile Block
missileblock.e: Player is allowed to block arrows and projectiles with their weapons and hands without penalty. Any arrow or projectile in motion touched by a weapon wielded or by the hand of the player is nullified
missileblock.n: Engulfing effects from blocked arrows and projectiles do not activate

naturalizemagic.name: Naturalize Magic
naturalizemagic.e: Bearer may cast Dispel Magic by announcing "[Player] thou art dispelled." Bearer must remove an Enchantment strip after each use of Dispel Magic and the Enchantment is removed when the last strip is removed

necromancer.name: Necromancer
necromancer.e: All magic purchased in the Death School becomes Charge x3. You may have a combined total of five active Greater Undead Minion and Undead Minion Enchantments
necromancer.l: You may not purchase any Enchantments from the Protection School

persistent.name: Persistent
persistent.e: Enchantment returns with the user after respawning until it has been otherwise removed

phasearrow.name: Phase Arrow
phasearrow.m: Arrow with grey cover labeled ‘Phase’
phasearrow.e: This arrow does not interact with ongoing Magic or Abilities. Example: This arrow is not stopped by Stoneskin, Protection from Projectiles, and does not trigger the effects of Troll Blood, Undead Minion, Missile Block, or similar Magic or Abilities
phasearrow.n: This arrow does not supercede the Frozen, Insubstantial, or Out of Game States

phasebolt.name: Phase Bolt
phasebolt.i: "The power of sorcery is mine to evoke" x3
phasebolt.e:
This Magic Ball does not interact with other ongoing Magic or Abilities. Example: This Magic Ball is not stopped by Stoneskin, Protection from Projectiles, and does not trigger the effects of Troll Blood, Undead Minion, Magic Ball Block, or similar Magic or Abilities. Will have one of the following effects:
1. A weapon hit is destroyed
2. Armor hit with Armor Points remaining is subject to Armor Breaking
3. A player hit receives a Wound in that hit location
phasebolt.n: Does not supercede the Frozen, Insubstantial, or Out of Game States

phoenixtears.name: Phoenix Tears
phoenixtears.i: "May the tears of the phoenix wash over thee" x3
phoenixtears.e:
Enchanted player does not die as normal. When the player would otherwise die they instead remove a strip and become Frozen for 30 seconds. When the Frozen State is ended the bearer has:
1. All Wounds removed
2. All States removed that are removed by Death or Respawning
3. All ongoing effects with a timer are expired
4. All of their equipment is fully repaired
5. All other enchantments, except those which are Persistent, are removed
Additionally Phoenix Tears allows you to wear an extra Enchantment from the Protection School. This extra enchantment is considered Persistent as long as Phoenix Tears is present. The additional Enchantment is not removed once Phoenix Tears is removed
phoenixtears.n: Phoenix Tears is removed when the last strip is removed

pinningarrow.name: Pinning Arrow
pinningarrow.m: Arrow with yellow head cover labeled ‘Pinning’
pinningarrow.e: A player struck by this arrow is Stopped for 30 seconds

planargrounding.name: Planar Grounding
planargrounding.i: "My power closes the aether to you" x3
planargrounding.e: Target player has their Insubstantial State removed and may not become Insubstantial for 30 seconds. May be cast on players who are not currently Insubstantial
planargrounding.n: Planar Grounding causes Enchantments that automatically render their bearer Insubstantial, such as Undead Minion, to fail and be removed if they activate while Planar Grounding is in effect

poison.name: Poison
poison.keywords: anti paladin assassin druid enchantment death
poison.i: "I coat these weapons with a deadly poison" x 2
poison.e: The next Wound dealt by the bearer in melee is Wounds Kill

poisonarrow.name: Poison Arrow
poisonarrow.m: Arrow with green head cover labeled ‘Poison’
poisonarrow.e: This arrow is Wounds Kill

poisonglands.name: Poison Glands
poisonglands.i: "Thou shalt secrete poison from thy venemous glands" x3
poisonglands.e: Bearer gains self-only Poison (ex) 1/Refresh Charge x3

priest.name: Priest
priest.e: Meta-magic may only be used on Spirit magics. All Meta-Magics purchased become 1/Life Charge x3. Heal costs zero points

protectionfrommagic.name: Protection from Magic
protectionfrommagic.keywords: healer wizard enchantment protection white magic
protectionfrommagic.r: Touch: Others (Paladin: Self or Touch: Others)
protectionfrommagic.i: "I enchant thee with protection from magic" x3
protectionfrommagic.e: Bearer is unaffected by magic from any school. Upon death the player is Cursed
protectionfrommagic.n: This effect does not interact with other Enchantments worn by the bearer.

protectionfromprojectiles.name: Protection from Projectiles
protectionfromprojectiles.i: "I enchant thee with Protection from Projectiles" x3
protectionfromprojectiles.e: Bearer is unaffected by ammunition, thrown javelins, rocks, and throwing weapons. Engulfing effects from those objects, such as Pinning Arrow, do not affect the player

pyrotechnics.name: Pyrotechnics
pyrotechnics.i: "I call upon the element of flame to destroy thy belongings" x3
pyrotechnics.e: All shields and weapons carried or worn by the target player are destroyed
pyrotechnics.l: Only affects shields and weapons carried or worn when the Verbal is completed

ranger.name: Ranger
ranger.e: The cost of all available Equipment is reduced to zero points. May use bows so long as a shield is not carried. The cost of all Enchantments is doubled

ravage.name: Ravage
ravage.i: "Death shall ravage thy flesh and make thee fragile" x3

regeneration.name: Regeneration
regeneration.i: "I grant thee the power of regeneration" x3
regeneration.e: Bearer gains unlimited use of Swift Heal (self-only)
regeneration.l: The Heal granted by Regeneration may not be used within 10’ of a living enemy

release.name: Release
release.keywords: bard druid healer scout wizard verbal sorcery
release.i: "From thy bindings thou art released" x5
release.e: A single ongoing effect or State is removed from the target. Casters choice
release.l: Cannot remove Cursed. When used to end a State or Ongoing Effect imposed by a magic or ability with multiple effects, all other States and Ongoing Effects from the same source are also ended

reload.name: Reload
reload.keywords: archer verbal sorcery out of game
reload.i: "I nocked my arrows to my bow, I let them fly, my quiver is low. Now I pause to go reload." x3
reload.e: Player becomes Out of Game and may move about the field retrieving their arrows
reload.l: Must stay at least 10’ away from other players at all times. The player may only remove their Out of Game state in the location they started by stating, "I return with a full quiver" x3
reload.n: May ask reeve for assistance in retrieving arrows that are within 10’ of other players

restoration.name: Restoration
restoration.i: "I restore thee to thy full potency"
restoration.e: Player has all uses of their per-life Magic and Abilities restored
restoration.l: Does not function on Empower, Confidence, Restoration, or similar Magic and Abilities. May not be used on the caster

resurrect.name: Resurrect
resurrect.keywords: druid healer monk paladin verbal spirit heal
resurrect.i:
Sword Cut, spear stab, mace smash, arrow jab,
Let the white light of healing descend on thee
Let the white light of healing stop thy spilling blood
Let the white light of healing mend thy bones
Let the white light of healing close thy wounds.
Let the white light of healing restore thy vigor.
The white light of healing hath resurrected thee.
resurrect.e: Target Dead player is returned to life. Non-Persistent Enchantments on the player are removed before the player returns to life. Any Wounds on the player are healed

sanctuary.name: Sanctuary
sanctuary.i: State "Sanctuary" without any weapons in hand
sanctuary.e: Player and their carried equipment are unaffected by hostile actions originating from within 20’. Must Chant "sanctuary". Player may normally end Sanctuary at any time by ceasing to chant, or by picking up a weapon with their hand
sanctuary.l: Player may not carry any weapons in hand during Sanctuary. Cannot carry nor affect game items or game objectives while in Sanctuary. Players in Sanctuary may not impede the play of other people in any manner, and must immediately remove themselves from any such situations they find themselves in. May not come within 20’ of a non-friendly base
sanctuary.n: If the player is voluntarily touching (other than blocking) or carrying weapons in any fashion (tucked under arms, tied to thongs, etc) at any point during Sanctuary then they may only voluntarily end Sanctuary within 20’ of a friendly base, and must continue chanting until there. Player is still susceptible to Phase Bolt and Phase Arrow

scavenge.name: Scavenge
scavenge.e: Repair one point of armor in one location, a shield, or a weapon

severspirit.name: Sever Spirit
severspirit.i: "The spirits lay a curse on thee." x3
severspirit.e: May only target dead players. Player is Cursed. Any Enchantments on the player are removed

shakeitoff.name: Shake It Off
shakeitoff.e: Shake It Off may be activated at any time the player is alive, even while the player would otherwise be prevented from activating abilities by Stunned, Suppressed, or similar. 10 seconds after activating Shake It Off the player may remove from themselves one State or effect of their choice which was present at the time they activated the ability

shatterweapon.name: Shatter Weapon
shatterweapon.i: "My power destroys thy [type of weapon]" x3

shove.name: Shove
shove.keywords: bard healer wizard verbal sorcery stopped
shove.e: Target player is moved back 20' in a straight line away from the caster. Works on Stopped players

silvertongue.name: Silver Tongue
silvertongue.i: "The seething sea ceaseth and thus the seething sea sufficeth us" x2
silvertongue.e: Bearer gains Swift 1/refresh Charge x3. Other sources of Swift may not be utilized while Silver Tongue is worn
silvertongue.n: Does not use up any purchased instances of Swift

sleightofmind.name: Sleight of Mind
sleightofmind.e: Enchantments worn by the bearer, other than Sleight of Mind, are not removed by Dispel Magic or similar Magic and Abilities. Does not count towards the bearer’s Enchantment Limit

sniper.name: Sniper
sniper.e: Player may physically carry any number of Specialty Arrows of each type. The frequency of each type of Specialty Arrow Ability becomes 1/Life Charge x3
sniper.l: May not fire normal arrows. Only one type of Specialty￼Arrow may be charged at any given time

songofbattle.name: Song of Battle
songofbattle.e: Bearer’s weapons are Armor Breaking. Bearer must Chant "Song of Battle" or sing a song regarding their martial prowess. Singing in place of the normal Chant is still a Chant and must follow all Chant rules

songofdeflection.name: Song of Deflection
songofdeflection.e: Bearer does not receive Wounds from ammunition, thrown javelins, rocks, and throwing weapons. Bearer must Chant "Song of Deflection" or sing a song regarding their acrobatic prowess. Singing in place of the normal Chant is still a Chant and must follow all Chant rules

songofdetermination.name: Song of Determination
songofdetermination.e: Bearer is Immune to Command. Bearer must Chant "Song of Determination" or sing a song regarding their determination. Singing in place of the normal Chant is still a Chant and must follow all Chant rules.

songoffreedom.name: Song of Freedom
songoffreedom.e: Bearer can not receive the States Stopped, Frozen, or Insubstantial unless caused by the bearer or other enchantments they carry. Bearer must Chant "Song of Freedom" or sing a song of roving or rambling. Singing in place of the normal Chant is still a Chant and must follow all Chant rules

songofinterference.name: Song of Interference
songofinterference.i: "I sing a song of dark magic thwarted"
songofinterference.e: As per Enlightened Soul. Bearer must Chant "Song of Interference" or sing a song about defeating/resisting the forces of magic. Singing in place of the normal Chant is still a Chant and must follow all Chant rules

songofpower.name: Song of Power
songofpower.e: Friendly players within 20’ of the bearer have their Charging Incantation repetitions divided by 2, rounded down. Bearer is Stopped. Bearer must Chant "Song of Power" or sing an inspiring song. Singing in place of the normal Chant is still a Chant and must follow all Chant rules

songofsurvival.name: Song of Survival
songofsurvival.i: "I sing of my numerous close calls"
songofsurvival.e: When the bearer would otherwise die, they instead announce "Song of Survival" and become Insubstantial. The caster treats the triggering event as though it had no effect on them other than triggering Song of Survival. Bearer may choose to return directly to their respawn location immediately after Song of Survival activates. Bearer must Chant "Song of Survival" or sing a song regarding their many escapes from certain doom
songofsurvival.l: Once Song of Survival has activated to protect the bearer it may not be cast again on the same life. Singing in place of the normal Chant is still a Chant and must follow all Chant rules
songofsurvival.n: Bearer may end the Insubstantial state caused by Song of Survival at any time with the standard Incantation

songofvisit.name: Song of Visit
songofvisit.i: "I sing to entertain friend and foe" x3
songofvisit.e: Bearer cannot be Wounded and is Immune to all schools. Bearer is Stopped. Bearer must Chant "Song of Visit" or sing a song regarding their general good nature and friendly disposition. Singing in place of the normal Chant is still a Chant and must follow all Chant rules. When Song of Visit is removed player becomes Insubstantial and must immediately move directly to their base. Upon arrival, they must immediately end the effect as per Insubstantial
songofvisit.l: Bearer may not wield weapons, interact with game objects, impede play, gain further Enchantments, or target any player
songofvisit.n: This Enchantment can be removed by Dispel Magic and similar Magic and Abilities

sphereofannihilation.name: Sphere of Annihilation
sphereofannihilation.i: "The power of void is mine to evoke" x3
sphereofannihilation.e:
Sphere of Annihilation will have one of the following effects on the object first struck:
1. A weapon hit is destroyed
2. A shield hit is subject to Shield Destroying
3. A player hit dies and is Cursed
sphereofannihilation.n: Ignores armor. Enchantments which affect equipment, such as Imbue Shield or Harden, do not function against Sphere of Annihilation

steallifeessence.name: Steal Life Essence
steallifeessence.keywords: anti paladin healer wizard verbal death charge
steallifeessence.e: Caster may heal a Wound or instantly Charge an ability
steallifeessence.l: May only be used on a dead player. That player is Cursed. Does not work on Cursed players. The caster still gains the effect even if the dead player is unaffected.
steallifeessence.n: In order to charge an ability, the name of the ability being charged must still be stated immediately after the incantation.

stoneform.name: Stoneform
stoneform.e: Caster is Frozen. May end this State at any time by saying "the earth release me"

stoneskin.name: Stoneskin
stoneskin.i: "May nature protect thee from all forms of attack" x3
stoneskin.e: Bearer gains 2 points of Magic armor affected as per Ancestral Armor

stun.name: Stun
stun.i: "By the power of white light I stun thee" x3
stun.e: Target player is Stunned for 30 seconds

summondead.name: Summon Dead
summondead.e: Target dead player may choose to go to the caster and then counts as though they had not moved from where they died. May be used on a dead player who has not moved from where they died or who is at their respawn location

summoner.name: Summoner
summoner.e: Each Enchantment purchased gives double the uses. Example: 1/Life Charge x3 becomes 2/life Charge x3, 2/ life becomes 4/life
summoner.l: May not purchase Verbals with a range other than Touch or Self. May not purchase equipment beyond 2nd level

suppressionarrow.name: Suppression Arrow
suppressionarrow.m: Arrow with purple head cover labeled ‘Suppression’
suppressionarrow.e: A player struck by this arrow is Suppressed for 30 seconds

suppressionbolt.name: Suppression Bolt
suppressionbolt.i: "The strength of suppression is mine to evoke" x3
suppressionbolt.e: Target is Suppressed for 60 seconds. Engulfing

swift.name: Swift
swift.keywords: bard druid healer wizard meta magic
swift.e: Magic and abilities require only a single iteration of the incantation. For multi-line Incantations use the last line
swift.l: May only be used on Magic and Abilities at a range of Ball, Touch, or Self. May not be used on the Charge incantation

teleport.name: Teleport
teleport.keywords: assassin druid healer wizard verbal sorcery insubstantial
teleport.e: Player becomes Insubstantial and moves directly to a location chosen at the time of casting by the caster. Upon arrival, they must immediately end the effect as per Insubstantial
teleport.n: If the player’s Insubstantial state is removed before they have reached their destination, the effects of Teleport end

terror.name: Terror
terror.e: Target may not attack or cast magic at the caster. Target must remain at least 50’ away from the caster unless forced there by another Magic or Ability. Lasts 30 seconds
terror.n: If the caster attacks or begins casting another magic at the target, this spell’s effect is negated

throw.name: Throw
throw.e: Target player is moved back 50’ in a straight line away from the caster. Works on Stopped players

tracking.name: Tracking
tracking.e: Target Insubstantial player immediately has their Insubstantial effect ended

trollblood.name: Troll Blood
trollblood.i: "The blood of the trolls sustains thee" x3
trollblood.e: Enchanted player does not die as normal. When the player would otherwise die they instead ignore the triggering effect as though it had not occurred, remove a strip, and become Frozen for 30 seconds. The bearer is treated as though they have the effects of Regeneration in addition to the above
trollblood.n: Troll Blood is removed when the last strip is removed

truegrit.name: True Grit
truegrit.i: "The wicked flee when I pursue" immediately after dying
truegrit.e: Player returns to life with their Wounds healed and is immediately Frozen for 30 seconds. Non-Persistent Enchantments on the player are removed before the player returns to life

undeadminion.name: Undead Minion
undeadminion.i:
Flesh rots, bones break, skulls sigh, spirits take let the power of my will descend on thee
let the power of my will restore thy spirit
let the power of my will knit thy corpse
let the power of my will give thee direction
let the power of my will cheat thy death
by the power of my will, arise my minion!
undeadminion.e:
1. Bearer does not die or respawn as normal
2. Bearer is Cursed, Fragile, and Suppressed
3. When the bearer would normally die, they instead become Insubstantial, remove all Wounds, and must return to the caster as soon as possible. Insubstantial players may not move more than 10’ from the caster and may not speak. The caster may touch the player and then Incant "Rise and fight again" x10 to end this Insubstantial State so long as no living enemies are within 10’ of the bearer
4. If this Enchantment's Insubstantial is removed from the Bearer in any other manner than outlined in item 3 (or prevented entirely) this Enchantment is removed
5. If the caster dies, this Enchantment is removed the next time the bearer returns to the caster
6. If the Enchantment is removed, the bearer dies
7. For the duration of the Enchantment, the Caster is considered the players respawn
8. Dead players may be targeted by Undead Minion and are immediately returned to life with all Wounds removed and the Insubstantial State applied
undeadminion.l:
1. The Insubstantial State imposed by Undead Minion can be removed or prevented by any Magic or Ability which would normally be capable of removing Insubstantial or preventing Insubstantial such as Tracking, Planar Grounding, Release, or similar Magic and Abilities
2. This Enchantment is removed by Banish and Dimensional Rift if used on the player while they are Insubstantial
3. The caster may not have more than three active Greater Undead Minion and Undead Minion Enchantments combined

vampirism.name: Vampirism
vampirism.i: "Thy hunger can never be sated" x3
vampirism.e: Player gains Adrenaline unlimited (ex), is Immune to Death, and is Cursed. Bearer’s Adrenaline ability will work through their Cursed State

voidtouched.name: Void Touched
voidtouched.i: "Embrace the old ones and surrender thyself" x3
voidtouched.e: Melee weapons wielded by bearer are Armor Breaking. Bearer may use Shadow Step 1/Refresh Charge x30 (ex), Steal Life Essence unlimited (ex), and is unaffected by magic from the Sorcery, Spirit, and Death Schools. May still benefit from their own Steal Life Essence. Player is Cursed
voidtouched.n: This effect does not interact with other Enchantments worn by the bearer

wardself.name: Ward Self
wardself.i: "The power of magic defends me" x3
wardself.e: Resistant to all effects from the next source which would inflict a Wound, Death, or State. Does not trigger against effects cast by the player

warder.name: Warder
warder.e: Each Enchantment purchased in the Protection School gives double the uses. Example: 1/Life Charge x3 becomes 2/life Charge x3, 2/life becomes 4/life
warder.l: Player may not purchase any magic from the Death, Command, or Subdual Schools

warlock.name: Warlock
warlock.e: Each Verbal purchased in the Death and Flame Schools gives double the uses. Example: 1/Life Charge x3 becomes 2/life Charge x3, 2/life becomes 4/life
warlock.l: Player may not purchase Verbals from any School other than the Death and Flame Schools

wordofmending.name: Word of Mending
wordofmending.e: All equipment carried by target player is repaired. All armor worn by target player is restored to full value
wordofmending.l: May not be cast within 20’ of a living enemy

wounding.name: Wounding
wounding.e: Target hit location on target player is Wounded
wounding.l: Has no effect on players already Wounded
